doc.title: A Clean Break
doc.plot: Eric and Bridget have broken up, and she hasn't called. He checks his phone and his answering machine, both are working. A radio announcer encourages those in Eric's shoes to give their lovers time, with no pressure and no hassles. But Eric needs to do something, so he decides to break into Bridget's apartment and take back his things. He makes a list, goes in through the kitchen window, and starts gathering stuff up. But what to do about his goldfish, Fred, who's in the bowl with Bridget's goldfish, Ethel. Can Eric sort out the fish and make a clean break?
